urls.title: Father's Day Part 3: Dan "Big Cat" Katz
urls.description: The superstar podcaster from Pardon My Take and dad of 2 opens up about fatherhood while working strange hours necessary for his career.

urls.title: A minor league announcer reported an assault, and 'In the end, it hurt me'
urls.description: Maura Sheridan reported an assault to the police and to the minor-league team she worked for. Then she found her job posted online.
